data.title: Hunger by Knut Hamsun – Canongate Books
data.meta_description: Hunger by Knut Hamsun - paperback (9781782117124) published by Canongate. The Nobel Prize-winning author Knut Hamsun’s Hunger, an influential work of twentieth-century modern literature, is now a Canon
data.text:
“One of the most disturbing novels in existence”

time Out

“An excellent new translation … this Hunger deserves to be the standard English version”

times Literary Supplement

“Hamsun has the qualities that belong to the very great, a complete omniscience on human nature”

Rebecca West
